resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
lafiona opened a new pull request, #13993:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13993

   ## Overview
   While setting up a queue repository for testing changes to `crossbow`, we noticed some updates that can be made to help future developers set up their environment. 
   
   ## Implementation
   1. The generated GitHub access token needs to have Workflow permissions to push workflow files to the queue repository.
   2. Update the instructions for running the crossbow command, now that it has been integrated into archery.
   3. Clarify Travis CI auto-cancellation default behavior.
   4. Typos
   5. Broken links
   
   ## Testing
   
   
   ## Future Directions
   
   
   ## Notes
   Thank you for your help on this pull request, @kevingurney!

   Thanks for opening a pull request!
   
   If this is not a [minor PR](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#Minor-Fixes). Could you open an issue for this pull request on JIRA? https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW
   
   Opening JIRAs ahead of time contributes to the [Openness](http://theapacheway.com/open/#:~:text=Openness%20allows%20new%20users%20the,must%20happen%20in%20the%20open.) of the Apache Arrow project.
   
   Then could you also rename pull request title in the following format?
   
       ARROW-${JIRA_ID}: [${COMPONENT}] ${SUMMARY}
   
   or
   
       MINOR: [${COMPONENT}] ${SUMMARY}
   
   See also:
   
     * [Other pull requests](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pulls/)
     * [Contribution Guidelines - How to contribute patches](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/developers/contributing.html#how-to-contribute-patches)

fields.description:
While setting up a queue repository for testing changes to {{{}crossbow{}}}, we noticed some updates that can be made to help future developers set up their environment. 

They include:
 # Clarify Travis CI auto-cancellation default behavior
 # Fixing broken links
 # Typos
fields.summary: [Doc] Updates to crossbow documentation for clarity
